name: analyze-dataset
title: Analyze Dataset
description: Perform comprehensive analysis of a dataset

arguments.name: analysis_goals
arguments.description: What you want to learn from the data

arguments.name: data_format
arguments.description: Format of the data (CSV, JSON, database, etc.)

arguments.dataset_description: Monthly sales data for 2024 including product categories, regions, and revenue
arguments.analysis_goals: Identify top-performing products and seasonal trends
